attributes.action: Review the law brought in on revenge porn in 2015
attributes.additional_details: In 2013 a young American girl chrissy chambers was declined any justice towards her ex partner who posted videos of himself  comiting a sexual act on a then 18 year old unconscious chrissy.
attributes.background: Review the law on revenge pawn passed in 2015 to incude all reports made befor the law was passed
